Title: Judgement Day
Writer: Rick Jacobson, Ivan Raimi (developed for television by), Sam Raimi (developed for television by), Tom Spezialy (developed for television by)
Actors: Bruce Campbell, Ray Santiago, Dana DeLorenzo, Arielle Carver-O'Neill
Plot: Chainsaw-handed demon hunter Ash returns to action when Elk Grove is threatened by a Deadite epidemic. Pablo's role as Brujo Especiale has him straddle the worlds of good and evil to keep the rift open for Ash to save Brandy and Kelly.
